user_instruction: 'Send an update to my coworker Sarah (sarah.thompson@cch.org) about our current projects. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["sarah.thompson@cch.org"],"subject":"Project Updates: HEAP & Vax4All","body":"Hi Sarah,

Hope you’re doing well. I wanted to share a quick update on the two projects we’re currently focused on:

HEAP Project
• We’ve drafted the schedule for the upcoming educational workshops aimed at boosting community health literacy.
• The informational pamphlets are in design review—graphics and key messages should be finalized shortly.
• The outline for the new web resources is complete, and I’m coordinating with IT to get a prototype ready for feedback.
Next steps: lock in workshop dates, finalize printed materials, and prepare wireframes for the web content.

Vax4All Initiative
• Potential temporary vaccination sites have been identified, and we’re confirming availability with local partners.
• Outreach materials are drafted; the communications team is reviewing them so we can launch a targeted awareness push.
• We’re in active discussions with healthcare providers to ensure we have staffing and supplies lined up.
Next steps: secure site agreements, approve outreach content, and finalize provider schedules.

Let me know if you have any questions or suggestions. I’m happy to dive deeper on any of the items above.

Thanks,
[Your Name]
"}
